prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered gentle pose with hands in taming gesture over geometric beast, chibi proportions with large geometric multi-faceted organic head with unique dodecahedron structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying sunlight divine. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating dodecahedron, fractal spiral, merkaba patterns, styled with Archangel marshals influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by Golden and neutral grey structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns fused with Whirling dervish skirts and simple woolen robes with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, incorporating spinning-friendly cotton, elaborate with pulsing Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and dodecahedron emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like solar medallion with golden ratio geometric design combined with Sufi heart pendant with sunlight spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor CHASLPO's profile: 'He of wonderous joy', Aethyr NIA, Earth element, Tarot Strength, Sephirot Tiphareth, Zodiac Leo, embodying the essence: 'In CHASLPO's presence, joy shines like sunlight a musical energy that inspires and buoys the spirit with exuberant life.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered gentle pose with hands in taming gesture over geometric beast
visual_elements.head_shape: large geometric multi-faceted organic head with unique dodecahedron structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with geometric facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying sunlight divine
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating dodecahedron, fractal spiral, merkaba patterns, styled with Archangel marshals influences

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns fused with Whirling dervish skirts and simple woolen robes
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, incorporating spinning-friendly cotton
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: solar medallion with golden ratio geometric design combined with Sufi heart pendant
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He of wonderous joy'
profile_data.essence: In CHASLPO's presence, joy shines like sunlight a musical energy that inspires and buoys the spirit with exuberant life.
profile_data.angelic_role: Archangel of Song of Joy; marshals granite-hewn wardens.
profile_data.form_description: A living geometric form embodying the earth element's solidity and the musical vibrational quality of joy, manifesting as a multi-faceted crystal that shifts between geometric precision and organic fluidity
profile_data.color_reasoning: Golden amber represents Tiphareth's solar radiance and Leo's nobility, while forest green connects to earth element and NIA Aethyr's organic vitality
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Dodecahedron represents divine intelligence, fractal spiral shows infinite complexity, merkaba symbolizes interdimensional transformation
